name: Square Battle (FMProductions)
description:
A game made in 1 hour for a Game Jam with the theme "Don't stop". In this game it means: Don't stop moving! 

Dodge the yellow square and its bullets! Instead try to hit the yellow square with yours!

Controls: 

- Control the white square with your mouse. 

- Click, drag the mouse and release your primary mouse button to shoot.
